questions.quote: Well, not anymore. He traded it to me for some Hollywood memorabilia.
Hey, see those two women over there? I almost dated the one on the right. She's in the closet business.
She was practically undressing in front of me at the theatre.
Mmm-mmm-mmm. That means, if you still had those stock options...
Drop the case? Well, congratulations, that'll save you some money.
But I finally realized what's missing, in my life. Structure. An' at Brand/Leland, I'm gettin' things done. An' I love the people I'm workin' with.
You know, I've seen you so many times and now we can finally talk to each other.
Oh yeah, he's fine, fine. He was in bad shape for a while though.
You know a chef who doesn't wash is like a cop who steals. It's a cry for help, he wants to get caught.
Will you look at that kid. Sucking away. Sucking like there's no tomorrow. Suck, suck, suck...
